alert.note: Alert for Covington; Jefferson Davis; Lamar (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 17 at 6:01PM CDT until April 17 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Covington County in southeastern Mississippi... Northwestern Lamar County in southeastern Mississippi... Southeastern Jefferson Davis County in south central Mississippi... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 601 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Melba, or 13 miles southwest of Collins, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Melba around 615 PM CDT. Sumrall around 630 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Bassfield and Seminary. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
